entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023
